name: Together (itch) (arletgrey)
description:
You're on a farm and random events occur, you must solve a minigame to determine whether the outcome is favourable.

At the moment the game is very basic, just using the Cow event and the Piano Minigame, created for the Weekly Jam #60 - Music.

Ran out of time to implement everything, lots of features missing and bugs, but the core concept has been explored as a MVP.
